name: Knock-Off Asteroids
description:
Knock-Off Asteroids was developed by me to practice my game development skills, as I aim to develop games weekly. This is my first project I have shown to the public and I will greatly appreciate any feedback that you may have on this game.

Controls:

W/Up Arrow - Acceleration

S/ Down Arrow - Deceleration 

D/ Right Arrow - Turn Right

A/Left Arrow - Turn Left

Space - Shoot
